The city of Statesville: NC, filed for an injunction to enforce compliance with city ordinances regarding the size of the American flag displayed by Camping World.
The Camping World Facebook post omitted: such as the option to replace the flag with a smaller one within the size regulations and the city's prior permit for an American flag of that size.
The CEO of Camping World: Marcus Lemonis, publicly expressed his refusal to remove the flag and garnered support through a Change.org petition with over 100,000 signatures.
